entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:35 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 09:02 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: NNE 22 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 7 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain at times mixed with snow beginning early this morning then changing to snow this morning. Risk of freezing rain late this morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature falling to minus 7 this morning then steady. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
